explains: v. 积累，积聚；<古>（人）聚集

sentences.en: My dream is to amass one million coffee mugs.
sentences.cn: 我的梦想是收集一百万个咖啡杯子。

sentences.en: He is planning to amass a fortune for a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 他正打算积蓄财富以备不时之需。

sentences.en: Iran continues to amass power and expand its regional influence.
sentences.cn: 伊朗在继续积攒力量并扩展它的区域影响力。
